alternativeNames: Wu, Su-gong; Wu, Su-kong; Wu, Shu Gong
examples: P example: Aleuritopteris longipes Ching & S.K.Wu,  Acta Bot. Yunnan. 5(2): 165. 1983;  S example: Saxifraga brachypoda D.Don var. eglandulosa (Harry Sm.) Shinobu Akiyama, H.Ohba & S.K.Wu, Bull. Natl. Sci. Mus., Tokyo, B. 26(3): 82. 2000
